casebody.data:
In the Matter of Steven Ehrlich (Admitted as Steven G. Ehrlich), a Suspended Attorney.

[— NYS2d —]

—Application for reinstatement granted, and petitioner reinstated as an attorney and counselor-at-law in the State of New York, effective the date hereof. No opinion. Concur — Ellerin, P. J., Sullivan, Rosenberger, Tom and Lerner, JJ.
